title: Artistic Style Generation and Interactive Design in Virtual Reality (VR) Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geometric concepts and experience with VR device usage
context.additional_context: Learners use personal VR devices via BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) to create virtual environments applying mathematical principles, experiencing artistic style implementation. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Perform object selection/manipulation tasks with 80% accuracy using a graphics-based interaction paradigm in a VR environment
Implement three or more artistic styles (e.g., watercolor, sketch, ukiyo-e) in virtual spaces by applying non-photorealistic rendering (NPR) techniques
Compare and evaluate interaction methods across six dimensions: learnability, accuracy, and user convenience based on experimental data analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
